summary: This adds sorting for all Arrows and Bolts in Skyrim including those added by Faction Crossbows
descriptionHtml:
I am a neat freak and like the sorting mods but couldn't find any that worked with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58704/?]Faction Crossbows
[/url]
This changes all ammo marked as playable to the following pre-fixes:

Arrow - Type
Bolt - Type
Bolt - Type (subtype)

That's all it does just like all the other sorting mods.

You will need the following requirements:

Skyrim, Dawnguard, Dragonborn
The latest official updates.
The latest un-official updates.
The Faction crossbows module.

I have added a optional that also includes the ammo from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43517/?]An NPO Module Crossbows[/url]
(You have to have the NPO mod also)

Fully compatible with Weapons and armor fixes remade!

I am very willing to make sorting compatibility additions for any mods or combos of mods just ask in the discussion section!
author: Kelsenellenelvian

files.name: Better Sorting for - An NPO Module - Crossbows and Faction Crossbows
